metrics.name: PO spend per supplier in Ariba
metrics.description: Average PO spend transacted with supplier on Ariba
metrics.signalFragment: SUM("PO Item Amount (INR)" ) / (COUNT( DISTINCT "PO Item Supplier ID" ))

metrics.name: % of PO spend created from Contracts, Catalog and Blanket Purchase Order
metrics.description: PO spend associated with Contracts, Catalog and Blanket Purchase Order as a % of total spend originating from Ariba
metrics.signalFragment:
(
  SUM("PO Item Amount (INR)") FILTER ( 
      WHERE "PO Item Contract ID" IS NOT NULL
      AND "PO Item Line Type" IN ('Catalog' , 'NonCatalog')
      ) 
  +
  SUM("PO Item Amount (INR)") FILTER ( 
      WHERE "PO Item Contract ID" IS NULL
      AND "PO Item Line Type" = 'Catalog'
      ) 
)
/   
SUM("PO Item Amount (INR)") FILTER (
  	WHERE "PO Item Line Type" IN ('Catalog' , 'NonCatalog')    	
	)    
* 100

metrics.name: % of PO spend on Contracts
metrics.description: PO spend associated with contract as a % of total spend originating from Ariba
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM("PO Item Amount (INR)") FILTER ( 
	WHERE "PO Item Contract ID" IS NOT NULL
	) 
/   
SUM("PO Item Amount (INR)") FILTER (
  	WHERE "PO Item Line Type" IN ('Catalog' , 'NonCatalog')    	
	)     
* 100

metrics.name: Process compliance
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES(${ptp_compliant_event_sequence})
	)
/ COUNT(case_id)
* 100

metrics.name: % of PO Spend on Non Catalog
metrics.description: PO spend associated with non catalog as a % of total spend originating from Ariba
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM("PO Item Amount (INR)") FILTER (
  	WHERE "PO Item Line Type" = 'NonCatalog'
	) 
/   
SUM("PO Item Amount (INR)") 
* 100

metrics.name: Average invoice payment time
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN (${invoice_clearing_events}))
	-(SELECT FIRST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN (${invoice_receipt_events}))
   )

metrics.name: % of PO Spend on Catalog
metrics.description: PO spend associated with non catalog as a % of total spend originating from Ariba
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM("PO Item Amount (INR)") FILTER (
  	WHERE "PO Item Line Type" = 'Catalog'
	) 
/   
SUM("PO Item Amount (INR)") 
* 100

metrics.name: Average Ariba Approval Invoice Cycle Time in Days
metrics.description: Average Time Taken from Invoice Submission to Invoice Approval​

metrics.name: Average confirmation time for purchase requisitions
metrics.description: Average time needed to confirm a purchase requisition by creating a purchase order
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN (${po_creation_events}))
	-(SELECT FIRST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN (${pr_creation_events}))
   )

metrics.name: Automation Rate Over Events
metrics.signalFragment:
count(event_name) FILTER 
(WHERE "Event Created By User Type" IN ('System','Service')) 
/ count(event_name) * 100

metrics.name: Late Payment Rate
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (WHERE ("Last Invoice Due Date" < "Last Invoice Payment Date")) / COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (WHERE ("Last Invoice Payment Date" IS NOT NULL)) * 100

metrics.name: Average cycle time
metrics.description: Average cycle time calculated from the first to the last event

metricVariables.name: invoice_receipt_events
metricVariables.description: Events indicating the receipt of an invoice, for example 'Record Invoice Receipt', 'Create FI Invoice'

metricVariables.name: pr_creation_events
metricVariables.description: Events indicating the creation of a purchase requisition item, for example 'Create PR Item'

metricVariables.name: ptp_compliant_event_sequence
metricVariables.description: Sequence of events that fulfil the compliance requirements of a Procure-to-Pay process, for example ^ 'Create PO Item' ~> 'Create Goods Receipt' ~> ('Create FI Invoice'|'Record Invoice Receipt') ~> 'Clear Invoice' $
metricVariables.value: ^ 'Create PR item' ~> 'Approve PR item' ~> 'Create PO Item' ~> 'Receive invoice' ~> 'Reconcile invoice' ~>  'Approve Invoice' ~> 'Pay Invoice' $

metricVariables.name: po_creation_events
metricVariables.description: Events indicating the creation of a purchase order, for example 'Create PO Item'

metricVariables.name: invoice_clearing_events
metricVariables.description: Events indicating the clearing of an invoice, for example 'Clear Invoice'
